Package io.micronaut.tracing.instrument.util

Class TracingPublisher<T>

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.tracing.instrument.util.TracingPublisher<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of element signaled
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.micronaut.core.async.publisher.Publishers.MicronautPublisher<T>, org.reactivestreams.Publisher<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
TracingCorePublisher
public class TracingPublisher<T> extends Object implements io.micronaut.core.async.publisher.Publishers.MicronautPublisher<T>
A reactive streams publisher that traces.
Since:
1.0
Author:
graemerocher

      publisher - the target publisher
      tracer - the tracer
      operationName - the operation name that should be started
      conversionService - the ConversionService instance

      Creates a new tracing publisher for the given arguments. This constructor will just add tracing of the existing span if it is present.

      publisher - the target publisher
      tracer - the tracer
      conversionService - the ConversionService instance

    • TracingPublisher

      public TracingPublisher(org.reactivestreams.Publisher<T> publisher, io.opentracing.Tracer tracer, io.opentracing.Tracer.SpanBuilder spanBuilder, boolean isSingle, io.micronaut.core.convert.ConversionService conversionService)
      Creates a new tracing publisher for the given arguments.
      Parameters:
      publisher - the target publisher
      tracer - the tracer
      spanBuilder - the span builder that represents the span that will be created when the publisher is subscribed to
      isSingle - true if the publisher emits a single item
      conversionService - the ConversionService instance

    • TracingPublisher

      public TracingPublisher(org.reactivestreams.Publisher<T> publisher, io.opentracing.Tracer tracer, io.opentracing.Tracer.SpanBuilder spanBuilder, boolean isSingle, io.micronaut.core.convert.ConversionService conversionService, @NonNull TracingObserver<T> tracingObserver)

      Parameters:
      publisher - the target publisher
      tracer - the tracer
      spanBuilder - the span builder that represents the span that will be created when the publisher is subscribed to
      isSingle - true if the publisher emits a single item
      conversionService - the ConversionService instance
      tracingObserver - the tracing observer

    • doSubscribe

      @Internal protected void doSubscribe(org.reactivestreams.Subscriber<? super T> actual, io.opentracing.ScopeManager scopeManager, io.opentracing.Span span, boolean finishOnClose)
      Do subscribe to the publisher.
      Parameters:
      actual - The actual subscriber
      scopeManager - The scope manager
      span - The span
      finishOnClose - Should finish on close?

    • isContinued

      protected boolean isContinued()
      Designed for subclasses to override if the current active span is to be continued by this publisher. False by default. This only has effects if no spanBuilder was defined.
      Returns:
      true, if the current span should be continued by this publisher
      Since:
      2.0.3

    • isFinishOnError

      protected boolean isFinishOnError()
      Designed for subclasses to override if the span needs to be finished upon error. True by default.
      Returns:
      true, if the active span needs to be finished on error
      Since:
      2.0.3

    • doOnNext

      protected void doOnNext(@NonNull T object, @NonNull io.opentracing.Span span)
      Designed for subclasses to override and implement custom behaviour when an item is emitted.
      Parameters:
      object - The object
      span - The span

    • doOnSubscribe

      protected void doOnSubscribe(@NonNull io.opentracing.Span span)
      Designed for subclasses to override and implement custom on subscribe behaviour.
      Parameters:
      span - The span

    • doOnFinish

      protected void doOnFinish(@NonNull io.opentracing.Span span)
      Designed for subclasses to override and implement custom on finish behaviour. Fired prior to calling Span.finish().
      Parameters:
      span - The span

    • doOnError

      protected void doOnError(@NonNull Throwable throwable, @NonNull io.opentracing.Span span)
      Designed for subclasses to override and implement custom on error behaviour.
      Parameters:
      throwable - The error
      span - The span
